chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: This plugin provides client side TMS (TileMapService) support. It provides a layer definition and it also defines services to interpret TileMapService XML capabilities files.

section.title: Plugin structure
section.para: This plugin contains multiple artifacts, that are listed below:

listitem.para: tms: The basic TMS client functionality. It contains a TmsLayer and support for parsing TileMapService XML capabilities files.
example-jar: Jar that contains showcase examples.

section.title: Versions
section.para: This plugin has support for TMS version 1.0.0.
